review: I purchased this to use on my TV of the family room.It's great cheap solution to cast media from portable device such smartphones and tablets.It's very easy to use once set up.My niece and nephews love casting videos off their smartphone and tablet onto the TV when they visit.I love being able to watch my TV shows off my phone and tablet on the big screen TV.Unfortunately, I do run into some apps that still hasn't worked out their bugs to run on chromecast.I use it with my iPhone, Galaxy S4, iPad and Nexus tablet, and it works better for my android devices than my iOS Apple devices.It's also great that Google still provides updates for whatever issues it comes across.I would definitely recommend it for it's cheap price and functionality.
author: David

review: I use Google Chromecast pretty much everyday. The investment is totally worth it. I got rid of cable and just use Chromecast for Netflix, HBO GO, Crackle, and Hulu.
author: Tayze

review: I was pleasantly surprised when I finally tried one of these.  The work well and the desktop plugin for chrome makes it easy to stream just about anything you can watch online.  There are also a few apps that allow the streaming of video from local sources (though there's still no VLC plugin yet.)It's kind of weird having no direct control over the chromecast but it's also nice to be able to use devices that you already have available and not have another keyboard laying around for a media center.Buying a few of these really saved me from running a lot of cables in my new house.  The only thing that could make this better is if I could stream the same thing to multiple devices at once.
author: Aaron
